TopicTitle: Join Kelly from Indie MEGABOOTH on KSP-TV Tonight at 6 PM CST

Articles.Content:
<p><a href="http://bit.ly/HRQ7zM"><img src="http://media.tumblr.com/fdc03873dfe3d83cbc35b748789fd475/tumblr_inline_mwj9ybfRgi1rr2wit.png"/></a></p>

<p>Tonight at 6 PM CST, Kelly Wallick from <strong><a href="http://bit.ly/19B2Tc2" target="_blank">Indie MEGABOOTH</a></strong> is stopping by <strong><a href="http://bit.ly/HRQ7zM" target="_blank">KSP-TV</a></strong> for a special event. She will be live streaming her way through <em>KSP’s</em> Career Mode.</p>

<p><strong><a href="http://bit.ly/19B2Tc2" target="_blank">Indie MEGABOOTH</a></strong> is an organization of indie game devs that come together and showcase the finest, most innovative titles in all of independent gaming at <strong>PAX</strong>. They’ve quickly become one of the most popular destinations during <strong>PAX</strong> and have given games like <strong>Stanley Parable</strong>, <strong>Contrast</strong> and <strong>Sportsfriends</strong> a major public platform each year.<br/><br/> You don’t want to miss this exciting look at <em>KSP’s</em> Career Mode being played LIVE by Kelly Wallick from <strong><a href="http://bit.ly/19B2Tc2" target="_blank">Indie MEGABOOTH</a></strong> on <strong><a href="http://bit.ly/HRQ7zM" target="_blank">KSP-TV</a></strong>. Tuesday night at 6PM CST!</p>
